Module W4
Package w4.baseplus

Class BasePlusCommissionEmployee

java.lang.Object
w4.emp.Employee
w4.comemp.CommissionEmployee
w4.baseplus.BasePlusCommissionEmployee
All Implemented Interfaces:
w4.paya.Payable
public class BasePlusCommissionEmployee extends w4.comemp.CommissionEmployee implements w4.paya.Payable
BasePlusComissionEmployee is A category of Employee, and a subclass of CommissionEmployee which is a subclass of Employee. It has a member variable baseSalary which is a base amount that an employee is paid along with his or her commission.
Author:
Jacky Chun Kit Siu

  • Constructor Details

    • BasePlusCommissionEmployee

      public BasePlusCommissionEmployee(String firstName, String lastName, String socialSecurityNumber, double grossSales, double commissionRate, double baseSalary)
      Constructor initializes the member variable baseSalary. It uses the super constructor to pass the parameters firstName, lastName, socialSecurityNumber, grossSales, commissionRate to its parent's constructor as well as its parent's parent's constructor. This Constructor will throw an IllegalArgumentException if grossSales is < 0.0 or if the commissionRate is < 0.0 or if the commissionRate is > 1.0 or if the baseSalary is <=0.0
      Parameters:
      firstName - --A String representing the first name of the base plus commission employee
      lastName - -- A String representing the last name of the base plus commission employee
      socialSecurityNumber - --A String representing the Social Security Number of the base plus commission employee
      grossSales - --A double representing the total amount in dollar of Sales made by the base plus commission employee
      commissionRate - --A double representing the commission rate between 0.0 and 1.0 of a base plus commission employee
      baseSalary - -- A double represent the base amount that a base plus commission employee should receive

    • toString

      public String toString()
